name: Love Breaker
description:
It's time to use your brain and find a way to separate of lovers!

You'll surely love this game once you get how it works!

Some levels might look easy but let's see if you can actually get the 3 stars.

Features
- Free to play, play it anywhere anytime
- Simple rules but a little difficult to clear the level, you'll find the addiction.
publishers: ZUUKS BILISIM HIZMETLERI SANAYI VE TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
